subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Texans fell to the Patriots on Dec. 10, the first loss in a late-season slide. They have refused to manufacture bravado for the rematch while embracing their underdog role.
snippet: The Texans fell to the Patriots on Dec. 10, the first loss in a late-season slide. They have refused to manufacture bravado for the rematch while embracing their underdog role.
